question: What is the theme of 54th edition of National Maritime Day (NMD)-2017?
option3: Make in India - an opportunity for martime sector
option4: Indian Coast Line - A New opportunity
explanation: The National Maritime Day (NMD) is celebrated every year in India on April 5 to commemorate the maiden voyage of the first Indian –owned ship “SS Loyalty” sailed  from Bombay to London on 5th April 1919. This was a crucial step for Indian shipping history when sea routes were controlled by the British. The 2017 theme of 54th edition of NMD is “Connecting India through Shipping\".  The United Nations\' World Maritime Day (WMD) is observed every year on September 29 to highlight the importance of shipping safety, maritime security and the marine environment.
